description: This table extracts the media related to the orders in INDICATOR_REL_ORD_TBL.

columns.name: PAT_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the patient indicators record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of a document linked to an order linked to a patient genomic indicator. Which order can be found by joining to INDICATOR_REL_ORD_TBL ON INDICATOR_REL_ORD_DOC.PAT_INDICATOR_ID = INDICATOR_REL_ORD_TBL.PAT_INDICATOR_ID and INDICATOR_REL_ORD_DOC.GROUP_LINE = INDICATOR_REL_ORD_TBL.LINE
